name: QOL for One Piece Revision 3
description: A collection of Quality of Life laws.

properties.Title: Towing Law
properties.UserDescription: This law enables the citizens of One Piece to move problematic vehicles. DO NOT GRIEF, it will be prosecuted!

properties.Title: Cleaning up
properties.UserDescription: This law enables the collection of debris on owned land in order to help with cleaning up our neighborhood.

properties.Title: District Protection
properties.UserDescription: This law protects districted land. In case you disagree, please contact the Mayor of One Piece.

Districts.internalDescription:
<foldout><linktext><u>3 Districts</u></linktext><title>3 Districts</title><link="view:3710:22396166"><icon name="District" type=""><color=#102171FF>OP Gov Build Revision 34</color></icon></link>

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

properties.Message: This river is protected from claiming in order to keep it beautiful and naturally.

PeopleToSendTo.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

properties.Title: Explosives
properties.UserDescription: This law prohibits the placement of dynamite and mining charges within public infrastructure of One Piece. Please be cautious!

properties.Title: Reputation Exchange Law
properties.UserDescription: This law rewards the reputation giver and motivates to spend the daily 15 reputation of a citizen.

properties.Title: Public Mining Allowance (Digging&Mining)
properties.UserDescription: This law enables Citizens to mine and dig under explicit districts within One Piece. Explosives restrictions are regulated under QOL for One Piece #7.

properties.Title: Mayoral Placement Power
properties.UserDescription: Enables the Mayor of One Piece to place Objects in unauthorized property.
